name: Push The Box (itch) (Kiritoholy)
description:
Hi there  !

This is my first game for particular game jam. The game is about a cube where you have to push all the boxes in portal as the game title suggest, but you only have limited time to do it 20seconds you need to push all the boxes in the portal in 20 seconds if you did it then next level will start ahead there are only 5 levels but the last two are harder so grab some snacks and play it and if you failed try again.

Enjoy!

Instructions to play:-

use W,A,S,D to move:

press 'R' to reload the level

Enjoy!
